description: Eco Post, based in Nairobi, Kenya, is a social enterprise dedicated to recycling plastic and producing durable construction products, primarily window and signage posts. Founded in 2009, the initiative aims to combat climate change by providing eco-friendly alternatives to wooden posts, thereby saving over 5,000 hectares of land and forests. Additionally, Eco Post empowers marginalized women by offering them job opportunities and skills training, fostering both environmental sustainability and social upliftment.
name: Eco Post Limited
